column2: hg4idea: Added a compare action to branch popup menu IDEA-187194

column3: to load changes, otherwise followed git4idea as much as possible
There is a little issue with the PR, unfortunately.

As a result, hg4idea and git4idea include a lot of almost duplicated code. The better approach would be to move common code from both plugins to the dvcs-impl module. Could you please adjust the changes accordingly?

@dmitriysmirnovjb You're right, I chose to do it this way so I can easily patch existing IDEA installations before the PR is approved.
This can obviously be done a lot better.

@dmitriysmirnovjb @AMPivovarov  I moved most of the UI code into dvcs-impl, had to play a little catch-up with GitCompareBranchesDiffPanel changes.
Hopefully this can be reviewed soon, otherwise it'll need constant re-merging.

Sorry for your troubles with conflicts.
I've noticed that it caused merge conflicts (and broke API for some plugins, that you couldn't know), so I thought to resolve them and apply manually.
@AMPivovarov Thank you for looking into it. I assume it broke things outside the intellij-community repo, but why would merge conflicts not be visible on github?
@idlsoft Yes, those were third-party plugins from Plugin Repository.
